CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper (with Robert Best masked out), October 28, 1961, pg. 19 reads: "La Rells Sing At New Arena - The slightly more than 1,00 guests who danced at the new Civic Auditorium, last Friday, to the music of Fats Domino, also enjoyed the singing of this popular Pittsburgh septet, known as La Rells. From left: Lafon McKellar, Alex Richburg, Frank Avery, Robert Best, Vann Harris, David Parr, and Wilton Anderson. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of the La Rells vocal group, from left: Lafon McKellar, Alex Richburg, Frank Avery, Vann Harris, David Parr, and Wilton Anderson, posed in V formation with arms crossed and background, including Robert Best, masked out
